response:
MIMETYPE_EXTENSION_MAPPING = {
    'video/3gpp': '3gp',
    'application/smpte-tt+xml': 'tt',
    'application/ttaf+xml': 'dfxp',
    'application/ttml+xml': 'ttml',
    'video/x-flv': 'flv',
    'video/x-mp4-fragmented': 'mp4',
    'application/x-sami': 'sami',
    'video/x-ms-wmv': 'wmv',
    'application/vnd.apple.mpegurl': 'm3u8',
    'application/x-mpegurl': 'm3u8',
    'application/dash+xml': 'mpd',
    'application/f4m+xml': 'f4m',
    'application/vnd.ms-sstr+xml': 'ism',
    'video/quicktime': 'mov',
    'video/mp2t': 'ts',
    'audio/x-wav': 'wav',
    'audio/mp4': 'm4a',
    'audio/mpeg': 'mp3'
}

def mimetype2ext(mt):
    """ Converts mimetype to extension
    """
    return MIMETYPE_EXTENSION_MAPPING.get(mt, mt)
